Catalano.Imaging.Tools

Class ColorDifference

  • java.lang.Object
    • Catalano.Imaging.Tools.ColorDifference

  • public class ColorDifference
extends java.lang.Object
    Calculate color differences. All of them refers to the CIE-L*ab color space.

    • Method Summary
